resources.string: When device perform an action automatically OS trigger an intent by mentioning that action.
Broadcast receiver is an Android component which allows you to receive application events. All the registered application are notified by the Android runtime once event happens.
Android service is a component that is used to perform operations on the background such as playing music, handle network transactions, interacting content providers etc. It doesn\'t has any UI.

Service is running as a background operation in the ui thread. The service should stop itself when its job is complete by calling stopSelf(), or another component can stop it by calling stopService().
Click start button, then onStartCommand() get invoked and service will start to running.When clicking stop, stopService() get invoked and service will stop running
